frontmatter.title: Joining the Bamboo Body in Barcelona

node.excerpt: One of the question, Tim Ferriss asks the people he interviews on his podcast is: “What purchase of $100 or less has most positively impacted your life in the last six months?” My answer:  The Bamboo Body  For more than 2 years I wanted to join the Bamboo Body. Oz told me all about it multiple times but I never found the time to go. I either had…
